sql: SELECT HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_DVC_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.LOGICAL_NAME,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_IT_ASSET_OWN_ORG_HIER1_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_IT_ASSET_OWN_ORG_HIER1_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_SUPP_OWN_ORG_HIER1_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_SUPP_OWN_ORG_HIER1_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_APP_PRTFL_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_ENBL_FG,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_RGN_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_STAT_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_FAIL_OVR_STAT_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_LAST_AVL_ESCLT_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_LAST_AVL_TMLNSS_TYPE_KY,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_LAST_AVL_STRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_LAST_AVL_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_AVL_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_DVC_TYPE_NM,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_PRIM_CI_FG,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODUSER,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_RDY_FG,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_INSTNC_PRTFL_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTDVCM1 HPESCLTDVCM1 WHERE HP_ESCLT_ID IN (SELECT HP_ESCLT_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTDVCM1 WHERE HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODTIME  >= SYSDATE -3 UNION ALL SELECT HP_ESCLT_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 WHERE HPESCLTM1.SYSMODTIME >=  SYSDATE -3) AND ROWNUM < =3

SELECT HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_DVC_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.LOGICAL_NAME,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_IT_ASSET_OWN_ORG_HIER1_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_IT_ASSET_OWN_ORG_HIER1_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_SUPP_OWN_ORG_HIER1_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_SUPP_OWN_ORG_HIER1_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_APP_PRTFL_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_ENBL_FG,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_RGN_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_STAT_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_FAIL_OVR_STAT_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_LAST_AVL_ESCLT_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_LAST_AVL_TMLNSS_TYPE_KY,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_LAST_AVL_STRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_LAST_AVL_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_AVL_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_DVC_TYPE_NM,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_PRIM_CI_FG,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODUSER,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_RDY_FG,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_INSTNC_PRTFL_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTDVCM1 HPESCLTDVCM1 WHERE HP_ESCLT_ID IN (SELECT HP_ESCLT_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTDVCM1 WHERE HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODTIME  >= SYSDATE -3 UNION ALL SELECT HP_ESCLT_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 WHERE HPESCLTM1.SYSMODTIME >=  SYSDATE -3) AND ROWNUM < =3

SELECT HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_DVC_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.LOGICAL_NAME,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_IT_ASSET_OWN_ORG_HIER1_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_IT_ASSET_OWN_ORG_HIER1_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_SUPP_OWN_ORG_HIER1_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_SUPP_OWN_ORG_HIER1_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_APP_PRTFL_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_ENBL_FG,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_RGN_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_STAT_TX,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_FAIL_OVR_STAT_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_LAST_AVL_ESCLT_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTDVCM1.ML_LAST_AVL_TMLNSS_TYPE_KY,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_LAST_AVL_STRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_LAST_AVL_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_ESCLT_AVL_ID,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_DVC_TYPE_NM,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_PRIM_CI_FG,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODUSER,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_S2S_RDY_FG,HPESCLTDVCM1.HP_INSTNC_PRTFL_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTDVCM1 HPESCLTDVCM1 WHERE HP_ESCLT_ID IN (SELECT HP_ESCLT_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTDVCM1 WHERE HPESCLTDVCM1.SYSMODTIME  >= SYSDATE -3 UNION ALL SELECT HP_ESCLT_ID FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 WHERE HPESCLTM1.SYSMODTIME >=  SYSDATE -3) AND ROWNUM < =3

SELECT HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_TTL_TX,HPESCLTM1.ML_ESCLT_STAT_KY,HPESCLTM1.ML_ESCLT_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTM1.HP_REQR_EMAIL_NM,HPESCLTM1.HP_REQR_ORG_NM,HPESCLTM1.ML_TMLNSS_TYPE_KY,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_NXT_MTG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_INCID_DSCVR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_ICC_ENGMT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_REQ_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_OPN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_BUS_CNTNTY_RSTR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_CNCL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTM1.HP_SRVC_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_SRVC_CATG_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_SRVC_SUBCAT_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_INIT_INCID_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_IS_TEMPL_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_TEMPL_TTL_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_TEMPL_TYPE_NM,HPESCLTM1.HP_TEMPL_OWN_NM,REPLACE(REPLACE(HP_CURR_STTN_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$') as HP_CURR_STTN_TX,REPLACE(REPLACE(HP_INIT_STTN_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$') as HP_INIT_STTN_TX,REPLACE(REPLACE(HP_CURR_IMPC_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$') as HP_CURR_IMPC_TX,REPLACE(REPLACE(HP_INIT_IMPC_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$') as HP_INIT_IMPC_TX,REPLACE(REPLACE(HP_WRKRND_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$') as HP_WRKRND_TX,REPLACE(REPLACE(HP_CNCLN_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$') as HP_CNCLN_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_INIT_CHG_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_INIT_PRBLM_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_CRT_PRBLM_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_PRIM_CI_LGCL_NM,HPESCLTM1.HP_PRIM_APP_PRTFL_ID,NULL AS HP_DTL_UPD_DN,HPESCLTM1.HP_ASGN_GRP_NM,HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_MGR_EMAIL_NM,HPESCLTM1.HP_ESCLT_CRT_EMAIL_NM,TO_CHAR(HPESCLTM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTM1.SYSMODUSER,HPESCLTM1.ML_DEV_ENGMT_KY,HPESCLTM1.ML_DEFN_WARR_PER_KY,SUBSTR(replace(replace(replace(HP_DTL_UPD_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$'),CHR(31),' '),0,100000) as HP_DTL_UPD_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_EMRG_CHG_RQR_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_EMRG_CHG_ID,HPESCLTM1.HP_EMRG_CHG_SBMT_EMAIL_NM,HPESCLTM1.HP_RECUR_ISS_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_RBT_RQR_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_EVDNC_DTL_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_VNDR_ENGMT_FG,HPESCLTM1.VENDOR,HPESCLTM1.HP_BUS_CNTNTY_ISS_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_VENDOR_INFO,HPESCLTM1.HP_VENDOR_RESPONSE,HPESCLTM1.HP_VENDOR_REFID_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_VENDOR_CON_TX,HPESCLTM1.HP_PROACTIVEMI_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_RESLT_CHG_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_CAPCTY_ISS_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_KM_UPD_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_DEV_ENGMT_FG,HPESCLTM1.HP_BUS_CNTNTY_ISS_FG,HPESCLTM1.COMPANY FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 HPESCLTM1 where HPESCLTM1.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE -3 AND ROWNUM <=3

HH24:MI:SS'),HPESCLTM1.SYSMODUSER,HPESCLTM1.ML_DEV_ENGMT_KY,HPESCLTM1.ML_DEFN_WARR_PER_KY,SUBSTR(replace(replace(replace(HP_DTL_UPD_TX,CHR(10),'$#$'),CHR(13),'$#$'),CHR(31),' '),0,100000) as FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 HPESCLTM1 where HPESCLTM1.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE -3 AND ROWNUM <=3

SELECT HPESCLTA1.HP_ESCLT_ID, HPESCLTA1.RECORD_NUMBER, HPESCLTA1.HP_PRBLM_CI_NM FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA1 HPESCLTA1 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA1.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA1.HP_ESCLT_ID, HPESCLTA1.RECORD_NUMBER, HPESCLTA1.HP_PRBLM_CI_NM FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA1 HPESCLTA1 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA1.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3

SELECT HPESCLTA2.HP_ESCLT_ID, HPESCLTA2.RECORD_NUMBER, HPESCLTA2.ML_KM_UPD_TYPE_KY, HPESCLTA2.HP_KM_UPD_DTL_TX  FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA2 HPESCLTA2 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA2.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA2.HP_ESCLT_ID, HPESCLTA2.RECORD_NUMBER, HPESCLTA2.ML_KM_UPD_TYPE_KY, HPESCLTA2.HP_KM_UPD_DTL_TX  FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA2 HPESCLTA2 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA2.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA3.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTA3.RECORD_NUMBER,HPESCLTA3.ML_CPCTY_ISS_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTA3.HP_CPCTY_ISS_TDL_TX FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA3 HPESCLTA3 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA3.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA3.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTA3.RECORD_NUMBER,HPESCLTA3.ML_CPCTY_ISS_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTA3.HP_CPCTY_ISS_TDL_TX FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA3 HPESCLTA3 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA3.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA3.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTA3.RECORD_NUMBER,HPESCLTA3.ML_CPCTY_ISS_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTA3.HP_CPCTY_ISS_TDL_TX FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA3 HPESCLTA3 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA3.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA4.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTA4.RECORD_NUMBER,HPESCLTA4.ML_RSTAT_SEVC_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTA4.HP_RSTAT_SEVC_DTL_TX FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA4 HPESCLTA4 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA4.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTA4.HP_ESCLT_ID,HPESCLTA4.RECORD_NUMBER,HPESCLTA4.ML_RSTAT_SEVC_TYPE_KY,HPESCLTA4.HP_RSTAT_SEVC_DTL_TX FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTM1 M, ITSMP.HPESCLTA4 HPESCLTA4 where M.HP_ESCLT_ID=HPESCLTA4.HP_ESCLT_ID AND M.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_ESCLT_ACTN_ID, HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_ESCLT_ID, HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_ACTN_ID, HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_ACTN_SUB_ID, HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_ACTN_OWN_EMAIL_NM, HPESCLTACTNM1.ML_ESCLT_ACTN_STAT_KY, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_DUE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTACTNM1.HP_ACTN_TX, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTACTNM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTACTNM1.SYSMODUSER, HPESCLTACTNM1.COMPANY FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTACTNM1 where SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTAVLM1.HP_ESCLT_AVL_ID, HPESCLTAVLM1.HP_ESCLT_ID, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTAVLM1.HP_STRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(HPESCLTAVLM1.HP_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTAVLM1.ML_ESCLT_EVNT_TYPE_KY, HPESCLTAVLM1.ML_TMLNSS_TYPE_KY, HPESCLTAVLM1.LOGICAL_NAME, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTAVLM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTAVLM1.SYSMODUSER,HPESCLTAVLM1.HP_NEED_FOR_RPT_FG,HPESCLTAVLM1.COMPANY FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTAVLM1 where HPESCLTAVLM1.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_ESCLT_CNTCT_ID, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_ESCLT_ID, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_CNTCT_FULL_NM, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_CNTCT_EMAIL_NM, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_ROLE_DN, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_PHONE_TX, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_MOB_TX, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_PAGER_TX, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTCNTCTM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTCNTCTM1.SYSMODUSER, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.HP_CNTCT_MGR_EMAIL_NM, HPESCLTCNTCTM1.ML_EMAIL_RCPNT_KY  FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTCNTCTM1 where HPESCLTCNTCTM1.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=3

SELECT HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_ESCLT_EVNT_ID, HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_ESCLT_ID, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_EVNT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_EVNT_TYPE_TX, HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_EVNT_DN, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTEVNTM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTEVNTM1.SYSMODUSER, HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_ESCLT_GRP_NM, HPESCLTEVNTM1.COMPANY FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTEVNTM1 where HPESCLTEVNTM1.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=5

SELECT HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_ESCLT_EVNT_ID, HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_ESCLT_ID, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_EVNT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_EVNT_TYPE_TX, HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_EVNT_DN, TO_CHAR(HPESCLTEVNTM1.SYSMODTIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), HPESCLTEVNTM1.SYSMODUSER, HPESCLTEVNTM1.HP_ESCLT_GRP_NM, HPESCLTEVNTM1.COMPANY FROM ITSMP.HPESCLTEVNTM1 where HPESCLTEVNTM1.SYSMODTIME>= SYSDATE - 3 AND ROWNUM<=5
